### Tender Description
The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) seeks a contractor to provide production and distribution of documents in alternative formats (reformatting) services. The contractor will respond to task authorizations (TAs) to provide a comprehensive range of one-stop-shop production and distribution services for print, web publishing, and electronic media. The contractor will modify original electronic text versions to ensure comprehension for documents prepared for conventional print publication, including elements such as footnotes, charts, and sidebars.

### Deliverables
The contractor will provide various documents in alternate formats, either electronically or in conventional print form, in English and French, to the Canadian public.
